item.title: Vintage Vegas: Remembering the Whimsical Money Tree Casino on the Strip
item.description:
A Little Luck and a Lot of Charm: The Money Tree Casino

The Las Vegas Strip has always been a landscape of contrasts – towering megaresorts casting shadows on humble, neighborhood joints. Among those smaller casinos that once thrived alongside the giants was the Money Tree Casino, a unique and fondly remembered piece of vintage Las Vegas history. Opening its doors in the early 1970s, the Money Tree offered a distinctly different experience than the glitz and glamour associated with the Strip’s rising behemoths.
